client.apis.v1.examine 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : examine.py
@Author      : liuda
@Time        : 2022/3/7 09:45
@Description : 审批相关
"""
from django.db.models import Q
from rest_framework.exceptions import APIException
from rest_framework.generics import ListAPIView, UpdateAPIView
from rest_framework.response import Response

from client.client_permissions import (
    XLetterManageOpenApproveReceivedTransferApprovePermission,
    XLetterManageOpenApproveReceivedTransferFinancingPermission111
)
from client.models.credit_certificate import ReviewLog, CreditCertificate
from client.serializers.examine import ReviewLogSerializer, CreditCertificateReviewSerializer
from utils.drf.paginations import MyPageNumberPagination



[文档]class ReviewLogListAPIView(ListAPIView):

    serializer_class = ReviewLogSerializer
    pagination_class = MyPageNumberPagination
    # 开立 转让 融资开立审批
    permission_classes = [XLetterManageOpenApproveReceivedTransferFinancingPermission111]


[文档]    def get_queryset(self):
        """
        重写获取审批日志逻辑
        @return:
        """
        log_id = self.request.query_params.get("credit_certificate_id")
        logs = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=log_id, data_table="credit_certificate"
        ).exclude(
            work_flow__code__in=[
                "transfer_application", "enclosure_upload", "transfer_complete",
                "open_application", "open_hold",
                "finance_contract", "finance_loan", "finance_apply"
            ]
        ).order_by("-id")
        return logs




[文档]class CreditCertificateReviewUpdateAPIView(UpdateAPIView):

    serializer_class = CreditCertificateReviewSerializer
    # 开立 转让 融资开立审批
    permission_classes = [XLetterManageOpenApproveReceivedTransferApprovePermission]


[文档]    def get_object(self):
        """
        获取信用凭证
        @return:
        """
        company = self.request.company

        if company.company_type.name == "financial_institutions":
            instance = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                pk=self.kwargs.get("pk"),
                credit__capital_company_id=company.id,
                review_status="reviewing"
            ).first()
        else:
            instance = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                Q(pk=self.kwargs.get("pk")),
                Q(review_status="reviewing"),
                Q(Q(company_id=company.id) | Q(from_company_id=company.id))
            ).first()
        if not instance:
            raise APIException("非法请求")
        return instance



[文档]    def update(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        instance = self.get_object()
        serializer = self.get_serializer(
            instance,
            data=request.data,
            context={
                "user_id": self.request.user.id,
                "company_id": self.request.company.id
            }
        )
        serializer.is_valid(raise_exception=True)
        self.perform_update(serializer)
        return Response({})
